showerReviews.reviewText: I like this TA you can alway find parking here no matter how late. They do have another men restroom upstairs where the shower are if the downstairs stall are all tooken. They have food options late night. But restaurants here does closed ‚Ä¶
Charges truckers 20-25 for parking and shower but can‚Äôt get new squeegees for the fuel isles I was better off not even cleaning my windows and mirrors

Ice cold showers. Shower 2 was pure ice. Jumped in water and realized no heat. Was too embarrassed to get dressed again, half showered, and bugging about no hot water; so I just left.

Not a good stop.

I stopped here for my 10 hour break. Was hoping to get a shower. There are no people to clean the showers. On my way in a driver was mad because he needed a oil change on his truck but they had no filters and oil here at the t/a.... Sounds ‚Ä¶
Restaurant is clean and fast. Salad bar was fully stocked and fresh. Service was good. Parking for trucks is good easy back in lots of space. Shower was spotless. Great job TA! Will stop again.
‚Ä¶ $15 for a shower. 1st one still had the towels from previous person still on the floor. 2nd one had garage in it. ‚Ä¶
If you can‚Äôt give me shower with just 1100$ spend on fuel without ultraone card Im not stoping here anymore. You lose business, loves win

It was a little slow today. Card reader wasn't working and for some reason the second seat shower system wasn't working. Otherwise not much change. I still am hopeful that the restaurant will reopen but not holding my breath. üòÇ ‚Ä¶

The first shower room was gross, hair all over the sink and toilet, so they gave us another shower room way cleaner. No hot food, I'm starting to think food stops being a concern after 8pm. So if you want to eat something they doesn't go in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Restaurant is closed down. Wait 2 hours to get a shower and they are out of clean towels to dry off.   There are plenty of TA/Petro close enough around to avoid this place forever.  5 of the diesel island lanes were closed as well. What ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: outstanding love's. tons of parking and very easy to get into. the showers were perfect, most pressure i've ever felt from a shower head, honestly a little painful. the taco john's inside is to die for.

Came about 2PM, plenty truck parking spot.
Nice shower, good water pressure.
So many people are working here but nobody cleaning washrooms waiting for an hour for shower. They talk rudely once if someone told them to clean the washroom.

I was excited about this new loves in town. I used to go to gary all the time. I visited today first time and booked the shower ( no. 6 ) when i went inside i was used but not cleaned all the towels were on the floor and was dirty i came ‚Ä¶

Best shower in the entire country! Great water pressure very clean showers a large facility with plenty of parking and plenty of room to move around in the shower room. They should make all loves like this one
It‚Äôs clean and new store. I love their big shower rooms and also a lot of parking lots spaces also good food.thanks taking care truckers

‚Ä¶ place you will get tow. Example is your stopping to get a quick shower and you don't find a parking spot and you go and take a shower ones you cone out you will not find your truck where you left it. This is just redeculus since we ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but....it is designed for "4 wheelers".  The building is a bit of a walk and this will only delay further how long it takes for Drivers to shower and get back to their trucks parked at the fuel island.  The DEF pumps are eXtremely slow.
Wasted my time waiting for shower then cancelled my shower after 2 hours üëéüèæ ‚Ä¶

locations.content: JD's Truck & Liquor Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: It's a okay truck stop. Make sure you have your tetanus shot if you step on the shower drain. Been in worse. I'm sure this was a top truck stop in the day of Carter. Friendly workers.

Pulled in just before 22:00, Went inside to pay for a shower (which they adverse on their road sign as an available amenity) Only to be told "Our showers aren't available" without any explanation as to why (time, being repaired, NOTHING! Ju ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Shower was small but clean. Could provide slightly better towels. The ones I got were threadbare rags that looked like they had been retired from a pilot long ago and a beach towel. They were "clean" but stained from heavy use.
Everyone was so nice.  Shower 5 takes quite a while to get the hot water going but im just grateful for a clean shower. ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking fellow truckers!!! We spent $20 in the restaurant so free parking. Didn't shower but it's affordable and by the reviews it may be decent. Dine in service was good, but food wasn't so much. I mean it's a refresh from typical ‚Ä¶
Nice Mom and Pop that's being renovated. The men's room was a little funky but looks like it's not been updated yet. The restaurant was good. $8 for a shower that was clean and new.

‚Ä¶ 24 hours, JD's Foodservice 6am till evening 8 or 9pm. Big Truck Stop with several Diesel Fueling stations. Also has Shower Facilities u can Rent. Sells Beer and Hard Liquour which helps when everything else within 5 miles closed at Ten.
Stinks in restroom and shower area.
